branchCategory.name: C(D)Q2-Z, Compact Cylinder, Single Acting Single Rod
branchCategory.description: Standard single acting, single rod version of the CQ2 compact cylinder. The CQ2 single acting is available in bore sizes from 12mm to 50mm. It comes standard with male or female piston rod threads. It is possible to mount auto switches on any of the 4 surfaces.

breadCrumb.name: C(D)Q2-Z, Single Act w/Auto Sw Mounting Groove
